document_data.name: The Razorhides
document_data.mainbody: '''The Razorhides''' were a gang of street thugs in [[Veltalar]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Organization: The leader of the Razorhides was [[Dherk]].
document_data.Activities: The Razorhides traded in [[traveler's dust]].{{cite book/City of Torment|32|4}} They were known to steal, and were rumored to kill freelance thieves, cutting out their limbs and spreading them around the docks.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Razorhides made their base of operations at an abandoned brewery in [[Veltalar]]'s wharf.
document_data.History: The [[warlock]] [[Japheth Donard]] strong-armed him into obedience in {{yearlink|1396}}, becoming their leader for a brief time, during which he demanded a thirty percent cut of all their takings.{{cite book/City of Torment|49-55|6}}
